QuestData.Title: The Favor of Zangus
QuestData.Description: An inscription on the back of the favor reads,$B$B"To my favorite pupil,$B$BIf you continue to show promise, I will teach you wonders beyond your imaginings.$B$BIf you do not, I will have you destroyed!$B$BAs ever,$B$BHigh Cultist Zangus"$B$BNo doubt the warden at Stars' Rest will want to see this.
QuestData.LogDescription: Deliver the Favor of Zangus to Warden Jodi Moonsong at Stars' Rest.
QuestData.CompletionText: I sense something foul is near.$B$BIt is upon your person! What is it, $n?
QuestData.RewardText: So, the leader of the cultists has revealed himself. We have a name.$B$BVanity and pride will be his downfall!
